positions.name: board_chair
positions.description: Leads the governing board; sets agendas and presides over meetings.

positions.name: board_vice_chair
positions.description: Supports/acts in place of the chair as needed.

positions.name: board_clerk
positions.description: Records board actions; manages official records and notices.

positions.name: school_board_member_trustee
positions.description: Elected/appointed governance of the district or school; sets policy and oversees superintendent/head.

positions.name: superintendent
positions.description: Chief executive of a public school district; accountable to the board.

positions.name: head_of_school
positions.description: Chief executive of an independent/private school.

positions.name: deputy_superintendent
positions.description: Second-in-command over district operations or academics.

positions.name: associate_superintendent
positions.description: Senior executive over major divisions (e.g., teaching & learning).

positions.name: assistant_superintendent
positions.description: Executive leader over specific functions or clusters of schools.

positions.name: chief_of_staff
positions.description: Coordinates executive priorities, cabinet operations, and cross-functional initiatives.

positions.name: general_counsel
positions.description: Provides legal guidance; manages risk, contracts, and compliance.

positions.name: ombudsperson
positions.description: Independent, confidential resource for resolving concerns and complaints.

positions.name: chief_equity_officer
positions.description: Leads equity, diversity, inclusion initiatives and policy.

positions.name: chief_schools_officer
positions.description: Oversees school portfolio and principals; drives performance.

positions.name: principal
positions.description: School-site leader responsible for instruction, operations, and culture.

positions.name: assistant_principal
positions.description: Supports principal in instruction, discipline, operations, and staff supervision.

positions.name: associate_principal
positions.description: Senior AP; often leads major school functions.

positions.name: dean_of_students
positions.description: Leads student conduct, attendance, culture, and MTSS supports.

positions.name: dean_of_academics
positions.description: Oversees curriculum, scheduling, grading, and academic quality.

positions.name: grade_level_dean
positions.description: Oversees a grade’s academic and behavioral support systems.

positions.name: activities_director
positions.description: Leads student activities, clubs, and co-curriculars.

positions.name: athletics_director
positions.description: Leads athletics programs, compliance, facilities, and scheduling.

positions.name: assistant_athletics_director
positions.description: Supports athletic director with operations and compliance.

positions.name: head_of_upper_school
positions.description: Leads upper/secondary division in independent schools.

positions.name: classroom_teacher
positions.description: Core instruction in content areas at elementary, middle, or high school.

positions.name: high_school_teacher
positions.description: Subject-specific instruction at high school level.

positions.name: physical_education_teacher
positions.description: PE instruction; fitness, health, and wellness.

positions.name: reading_interventionist
positions.description: Targeted literacy interventions and progress monitoring.

positions.name: math_interventionist
positions.description: Targeted math interventions and progress monitoring.

positions.name: instructional_coach
positions.description: Job-embedded coaching on pedagogy and curriculum.

positions.name: literacy_coach
positions.description: Specialized coaching in reading and writing instruction.

positions.name: mentor_teacher
positions.description: Supports novice teachers with induction and practice.

positions.name: teacher_librarian
positions.description: Certified librarian providing instruction and curation.

positions.name: long_term_substitute
positions.description: Extended coverage; curriculum and grading responsibilities.

positions.name: teacher_resident
positions.description: Residency preparation role co-teaching with a mentor.

positions.name: family_liaison
positions.description: Connects families with resources and the school.

positions.name: school_nurse
positions.description: Health services, care plans, medication, records.

positions.name: health_aide
positions.description: Supports nurse; first aid and documentation.

positions.name: truancy_officer
positions.description: Enforces compulsory attendance with due process.

positions.name: foster_care_liaison
positions.description: Coordinates supports for students in foster care.

positions.name: behavior_support_coach
positions.description: Coaches staff on behavior systems and PBIS.

positions.name: registrar
positions.description: Manages student records, transcripts, and enrollments.

positions.name: school_secretary
positions.description: Front office operations and parent/student support.

positions.name: receptionist
positions.description: Greets visitors, answers phones, and routes inquiries.

positions.name: data_clerk
positions.description: Data entry, audits, and SIS support.

positions.name: sis_clerk
positions.description: Specialist data entry and reports in SIS.

positions.name: health_office_clerk
positions.description: Supports school nurse and health records.

positions.name: head_coach
positions.description: Leads a sport program and coaching staff.

positions.name: assistant_coach
positions.description: Supports head coach with training and supervision.

positions.name: athletic_trainer
positions.description: Sports medicine, injury prevention, and rehab.

positions.name: chief_academic_officer
positions.description: Leads curriculum, instruction, assessment, and school improvement.

positions.name: director_of_student_support_services
positions.description: Oversees counseling, nursing, social work, and supports.

positions.name: director_of_curriculum_and_instruction
positions.description: Leads curriculum adoption, PD, and pedagogy.

positions.name: director_of_assessment_research_evaluation
positions.description: Oversees testing, analytics, and program evaluation.

positions.name: director_of_data_analytics
positions.description: Leads analytics, dashboards, and data governance.

positions.name: professional_development_coordinator
positions.description: Plans and manages staff learning programs.

positions.name: teacher_induction_coordinator
positions.description: New teacher support and certification pathways.

positions.name: director_of_special_education
positions.description: Leads SPED/Exceptional Student Services and compliance (IDEA).

positions.name: special_education_teacher
positions.description: Instruction and services for students with disabilities.

positions.name: sped_case_manager
positions.description: Coordinates IEPs, services, and progress reporting.

positions.name: school_psychologist
positions.description: Evaluation, counseling, MTSS, and IEP support.

positions.name: vision_specialist
positions.description: Services for students with visual impairments.

positions.name: orientation_and_mobility_specialist
positions.description: Travel/orientation training for visually impaired students.

positions.name: deaf_hard_of_hearing_teacher
positions.description: Instruction and support for D/HH students.

positions.name: 504_coordinator
positions.description: Leads Section 504 identification and accommodation plans.

positions.name: sign_language_interpreter
positions.description: ASL/interpretation services for students and families.

positions.name: vocational_specialist
positions.description: Career exploration and work-based learning supports.

positions.name: pathways_coordinator
positions.description: Coordinates career/college pathways and work-based learning.

positions.name: librarian
positions.description: Library program lead; instruction and curation.

positions.name: chief_operations_officer
positions.description: Oversees non-instructional operations (facilities, transport, nutrition, safety).

positions.name: director_of_facilities
positions.description: Leads facilities strategy, maintenance, and capital projects.

positions.name: facilities_manager
positions.description: Oversees site maintenance and work orders.

positions.name: plant_manager
positions.description: Leads plant operations at large sites.

positions.name: director_of_transportation
positions.description: Leads routing, fleet, and driver operations.

positions.name: bus_driver
positions.description: Student transportation on regular and trip routes.

positions.name: bus_aide_monitor
positions.description: Student supervision and safety on buses.

positions.name: fleet_manager
positions.description: Oversees maintenance shop and fleet lifecycle.

positions.name: director_of_nutrition_services
positions.description: Leads USDA-compliant meal programs and kitchens.

positions.name: director_of_safety_security
positions.description: Leads security strategy, staffing, and incident response.

positions.name: emergency_management_director
positions.description: Plans drills, response, and recovery operations.

positions.name: school_resource_officer
positions.description: Law enforcement officer assigned to schools.

positions.name: chief_financial_officer
positions.description: Leads finance, budgeting, accounting, and fiscal reporting.

positions.name: chief_human_resources_officer
positions.description: Leads talent strategy, employee relations, payroll/benefits, and compliance.

positions.name: recruiter
positions.description: Leads talent sourcing and hiring pipelines.

positions.name: chief_information_officer
positions.description: Leads technology strategy, systems, data, and cybersecurity.

positions.name: chief_technology_officer
positions.description: Oversees IT infrastructure, networks, endpoints, and platforms.

positions.name: director_of_technology
positions.description: Leads district technology vision and delivery.

positions.name: it_director
positions.description: Alternative title for Director of Technology.

positions.name: information_security_officer
positions.description: Security policy, controls, and incident response.

positions.name: sis_administrator
positions.description: Student information system configuration and support.

positions.name: chief_communications_officer
positions.description: Directs communications, media relations, branding, and engagement.

positions.name: communications_director
positions.description: Leads comms strategy and media relations.
